item.title: Nestlé CEO Laurent Freixe ousted over inappropriate workplace relationship with subordinate
item.description: Nestlé removes CEO Laurent Freixe over inappropriate workplace relationship and appoints Philipp Navratil as new chief executive officer.

item.title: Spirit Airlines files for second bankruptcy in under a year as low-cost carrier continues to struggle
item.description: Spirit Airlines enters the Chapter 11 restructuring process again while assuring customers that flights and services will continue operating normally.
